original: 'gugs byang ni /
analyzed: gugs byang ni

original: na mo / rig 'dzin rtsha brgyud kyi dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bka'\u0f8e
analyzed: na mo rig dzin rtsha brgyud kyi dpal ldan bla ma dam ba rnams kyi bka bden ba dang sangs rgya kyi bka\u0f8e

original: chos kyi bka'\u0f8e dge 'dun gyi bka'\u0f8e
analyzed: chos kyi bka\u0f8e dge dun gyi bka\u0f8e

original: gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa dang / chos nyid gdod nas stongs kyang chos can rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa'i bden pa dang / khyad par drang srong sngags rgod lok+t+ri pa la'i lha tshhogs bka' sdod dam can rgya mtshho'i tshhogs dang bcas pa rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang /
analyzed: gsang sngags dang rig sngags dang gzungs sngags dang snying po dang phyag rgya dang ting nge dzin gyi bden ba dang chos nyid gdod nas stongs kyang chos can rgyu bras bslu ba med ba bden ba dang khyad ba dren srong sngags rgod lok+t+ri ba la lha tshhogs bka sdod dam can rgya mtshho tshhogs dang cha ba rnams kyi bka bden ba dang

original: bden pa chen po'i mthu la brten nas bstan dang 'gro ba'i spyi dgra /
analyzed: bden ba chen po mthu la rten nas ston dang gro ba spyi dgra

original: khyad par rig pa 'dzin pa bdag cag yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la snga dgra lag gis bsdar ba /
analyzed: khyad ba rig ba dzin ba bdag cag yon mchod khor dang cha ba rnams la snga dgra lag gis bsdar ba

original: phyi dgra yid la sems pa /
analyzed: phyi dgra yid la sems ba

original: da dgra thad du 'dzugs pa'i gzugs can sdang ba'i dgra dang / gzugs med gnod byed bgegs kyi tshhogs dang bcas pa thams cad srid pa gsum gyi khongs gar gnas gar bros kyang /
analyzed: da dgra thad du dzugs ba gzugs can sdang ba dgra dang gzugs med gnod byed bgegs kyi tshhogs dang cha ba thams cad srid ba gsum gyi khongs gar gnas gar bros kyang
